title: Fragment, 1783–89
medium:
Meedium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave; marks are block printed
inscribed: " MANUFACTUR ROYALE DE S DM OBERKAMPF A JOUY PRES VERSAILLES BON TEINT" in oval frame. "D116" in black, "14", the last two numerals of a longer number "56" and "3(6)2 in dark grey. "C.R." is printed twice in red.
dimensions: Warp: 7cm (2 3/4in.). Weft: 71cm (28 in.) All edges cut.
description: Only a fragment of the design is visible; a woman leaning forward and the heads of a man and a woman in front of her.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1783–89.
1783–89. Meedium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave; marks are block printed. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-14.
